title: Microsoft Office 2007.zip
description:
The full Office 2007 Enterprise edition without the annoying Trojan Horse. Loads fine. During setup it asks for a missing file. Hit ignore or whatever the button says. It will work fine, and will download updates without problems. DO NOT REGISTER or do anything that lets MS look at your apps. It will notify you that you have an illegal s/n.

Happened to me, but updates still work. Good to go.
